item.title: Announcing SRCCON 5: Minneapolis, June 28 & 29
item.description: For our fifth SRCCON, we’re evolving our approach to the conference. It will still be the highly-participatory, peer-led, human-first conference you’ve come to expect, but we’ll be trying some new things too.
